text_orientation_phone=”justified” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What makes us the most selling tractor in India?

Our Strength

In 2006, Indo Farm established a cutting-edge foundry spanning 5 acres, dedicated to our captive grey iron and SC iron Foundry. The foundry unit is equipped with induction furnaces, pneumatic moulding machines, an automatic Moulding line, a sand plant, and a fully equipped metallurgy and sand testing laboratory.

Advantages

  • A 5-acre area and 600-ton capacity enable meticulous focus, ensuring top-notch quality for critical castings.
  • With ample space and high capacity, we swiftly adapt production cycles to cater to dynamic market demands.
  • Increased production capability minimizes inventories, enhancing overall efficiency and cost-effectiveness.
  • Positioned for growth, our facility is poised to serve as an OEM for other automobile manufacturers, opening new avenues for collaboration.

Boasting over 150 modern machines, including CMM, SPMs, and state-of-the-art CNC machining centers, we excel in crafting high-quality components like Cylinder heads, Blocks, Transmission housings, Gearboxes, Hydraulic housings, Axle Tubes, Differential Cages, Timing cases, and covers with precision and excellence.

 

Research and Innovation

At the Indo Farm Research & Innovation Centre, our specialized engineers are equipped with the latest technology and are dedicated to providing tailored solutions to our customers. Our center is responsible for the meticulous design and testing of products by our expert staff.

The primary focus of our R&D function is to expedite innovation and enhance the value of each product, ultimately delivering economic benefits to a wide customer base. Our highly skilled and experienced workforce is adept at developing products ranging from 20 HP to 110 HP, serving both domestic and international markets. 

The R&D department also collaborates closely with the production department to ensure a seamless transition of technology from the design phase to assembly line production.

 

Key achievements in Engine technology

  • Indigenization of technology to manufacture top-quality tractor engines for the 2-series tractors. The technology was initially obtained from URSUS, Poland. 
  • Development of two new high-performance engines, namely 3-cylinder and 4-cylinder which are used in our 3 series tractor and crane models. 
  • Designing a re-entrant combustion chamber for better air-fuel mixing which yields higher fuel efficiency.

What makes us the best choice of tractor manufacturers in India?

Comfort and Ergonomics:

Indo Farm tractors are meticulously designed to prioritize comfort. With strategically positioned main controls, operators can easily access and operate the essential functions.  Our tractors minimize fatigue and enhance overall ease of use.

 

Versatility and Performance:

Outperforming traditional isodiametric tractors, our products offer exceptional versatility and superior performance. With an emphasis on power and efficiency, our farming tractors provide excellent power output combined with exceptional mileage.

 

Operator Comfort:

Featuring a flat platform with ample space, user-friendly levers and handles, ergonomic controls and pedals, an adjustable seat, and a convenient mounting handle on the left side, our tractors are engineered to ensure maximum operator comfort. This design allows for more productive working hours without compromising operator well-being or performance.

 

INDO FARM TRACTOR’S STRENGTHS
Powerful Engine & High Fuel Efficiency

Experience the might of our engines, delivering high fuel efficiency and unmatched power.

  • Constant Mesh Gearbox
    Our constant mesh gearbox ensures a seamless engagement of pinion and gear, resulting in reduced wear and extended gear life.
  • High Back-Up Torque
    Conquer deep cultivation and effortlessly haul heavy loads on steep gradients with our high back-up torque
  • Oil-Immersed Brakes
    Our oil-immersed brakes offer superior stopping power and a longer lifespan due to effective oil cooling, making them ideal for puddling and hilly terrain haulage.
  • Power Steering
    Enhance your operational ease, operator comfort, and safety in demanding applications with our power steering feature.
  • Dual Clutch
    Shift gears seamlessly while operating the Power Take-Off (PTO) for equipment like reapers, balers, post-hole diggers, and more.
  • Reverse PTO
    When your farm equipment encounters obstacles during its tasks, the reverse PTO comes to the rescue.
  • Enhanced Speed
    Enjoy increased speed for transportation and carriage needs, ensuring your tasks are completed swiftly and efficiently.
  • DC Valve
    Our DC valve is the perfect match for hydraulically operated equipment, ensuring smooth and precise operation every time.
  • High-Capacity Hydraulic Lift
    Rely on our high-capacity hydraulic lift for heavy implements and tipping trailers with substantial loads.
